title: Firefox takes 10-15 minutes to load since last update
content:
For the past three days I've been unable to get Firefox to load quickly as it used to before the last update. The last time this happened the problem was conflict with my security software System Mechanic. That problem was taken care of. This time I tried rebooting the computer, turning off all my add-ons, safe mode...nothing worked.

I'm using Win 10 64 bit. Can you help?
creator: joyce.greer2

title: Scegliere VERAMENTE la cartella dove scaricare i file
content: La cartella di download rimane sempre e comunque la cartella "Download"; la cartella scelta in "Impostazioni" viene utilizzata DOPO che il file Ã¨ stato scarica nella cartella "Download" del disco C. Quindi, quando scelgo una cartella diversa, in pratica salvo il file DUE VOLTE e ogni volta devo andare a cancellare il file scaricato in C:\...\Download. Assurdo. Grazie per ogni aiuto per eliminare questa opzione che sembra fissa.
creator: massimodec

title: Re: ebay.com.au not opening on firefox only opens on first few seconds of firefox starting then does not
content: please help firefox upto date but ebay.com.au not opening but opens in edge browser
